text:
RELIGION

Ramakrishna Mutt: Arathi, Reserve Line, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Gita Bhavanam: 68{+t}{+h}anniversary, 45-day yagna, Kamarajar Salai, 7.30 a.m.

Thiruvalluvar Mandram: Discourse on Avvai Kural by A.K.S. Thirumavalavan, S.S. Colony, 5 p.m.

Thiruvalluvar Kazhagam: Oratorical competition for college students in ‘Thirukural,’ North Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 5 p.m.

Panniru Thirumurai Mandram: Abirami Anthathi Parayanam, mutrodal, Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 6 p.m.

Young Men’s Brahmins’ Association: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayanam and puja, No. 21 Sambandamoorthy Street, 6 p.m.

Sreemath Bhagavath Geetha Siravana Samajam: 85{+t}{+h}year sreemath gita siravana, Gita upanyasam, Govinda Dasa Seva Samajam, Mahal Sixth Street, 6 p.m.

Tirupavai Tiruvembavai Isaipalli: Devotional songs, 6 a.m.; Paavai songs and devotional songs, Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 6 p.m.

Madurai Srimad Venkatramana Bhagavada Seva Samajam: 235{+t}{+h}jayanthi celebrations of Venkatramana Bhagavadar, ganapathi homam, 6.30 a.m.; ‘Isai Vizha,’ Union Minister Pon. Radhakrishnan, chief guest, 10 a.m.; nadha sangamam, 12 noon; Carnatic music, Sourashtra Sabai Sri Ranga Mahal, No. 13 South Krishnan Temple Street, South Masi Street, 4 p.m.

CULTURE

Sri Sathguru Sangeetha Samajam: 64{+t}{+h}music and arts festival, vocal concert by Sikkil C. Gurucharan, Lakshmi Sundaram Hall, 6 p.m.

Gandhi Memorial Museum: K.P. Gangadharan conducts, yoga classes, 6 a.m., 10.30 a.m. and 5 p.m.

Tamil Isai Sangam: Swami Sivayogananda talks on ‘Role of Arjuna in Mahabharatha,’ Rajah Muthiah Mandram, 6.30 p.m.

Rama Samajam: Discourse on Ramayanam by R. Hariji, Sringeri Sri Saradambal Sannidhi, Bypass Road, 6.30 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women)

Prajapita Brahma Kumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes, 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Yoga Research Centre: Yoga training by S. Yoganand, Department of Philosophy, The Madura College, 6.30 a.m.

GENERAL

Yadava College: Workshop on ‘Quality enhancement for survival of Indian industries -the need of the hour’ by R.S. Mani of VIT, Vellore Rajendranar Auditorium, 2 p.m.; Department of Commerce, lecture on ‘Self-development,’ by K. Ramamurthi and K.T. Vijay Karthigeyan of Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology, Smart Class Room, 10.30 a.m.

Thiagarajar College: Lecture on ‘A new look at economics and economy’ by A. Christober Dhas of The American College, Diamond Jubilee Hall, 11.30 a.m.; Department of Commerce, lecture on ‘Statistical tools for decision making’ by M. Manoharan of CPA College, Bodi, Smart Class Room, 11.30 a.m.

Sourashtra College: Fifth session of Nature Cure Association, MCA Class Room, 1 p.m.

INTACH and Thiagarajar College: Clean monument campaign and poster making competition, B. George of Madurai Kamaraj University College, chief guest, Gandhi Memorial Museum, 9.30 a.m.

Mannar Thirumalai Naicker College: Department of English screens short film, G. Sundararajan Seminar Hall, 11.45 a.m.

Madurai District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association: Opportunities for neo-entrepreneurs by T. Jothimurugan, Director, KLN Engineering College, L. Murari, president, presides, Maditssia Hall, 5 p.m.

Amutha Surabi Kalai Mandram: Pongal celebrations by students, Mayor V.V. Rajan Chellappa, chief guest, Tamukkum Grounds, 10 a.m.

Ram Psychiatry Hospital: 30{+t}{+h}year anniversary, Continuing Medical Education programme, V.D. Krishnaram, chairman, presides, Mohan Isaac, consultant psychiatrist, University of Western Australia, speaks on ‘How can evidence based medicine be practised in psychiatry,’ Hotel Fortune Pandian, 8 p.m.

MNU Jayaraj Nadar School: 59{+t}{+h}Annual Day celebration, A. Kaliamurthi, former Superintendent of Police, chief guest, S.K. Mohan, general secretary, presides, K.P.S.V.R. Gurusami Grounds, 5 p.m.

Our Lady Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Free medical camp in association with Lion Club of Madurai Vaigai and Meenakshi Mission Hospital, 9.30 a.m.

Voluntary Association for People Service: Valedictory function of micro enterprise development programme on jute bag making, S. Santhakumar, General Manager, District Industries Centre, addresses, No. 39 Besant Road, Chokkikulam, 11.30 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, Rosary Church, Town Hall Road, 7 p.m.

SPORTS

K.L.N. College of Information Technology: Two-day first State-level inter-school boys kabaddi and girls volleyball tournament, K.N.K. Ganesh, correspondent, presides, 10.30 a.m.

MELUR

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, R.C. School, Sivaganga Road, 6.30 p.m.
title: Madurai Today
